level.introtext: You're almost to the end! Can you output the right answers?
level.endtext: Congratulations! You've mastered data types and variables!
level.code:
Combining strings and integers is a bit trickier. rank = "agent 00" number = 7; print(rank, number)
Programming problems always have exactly 1 solution. There are often many ways to solve a programming problem!
PRINTF can be used to output like cout. print("hello world") sys.stdout.write("hello world"); The above two lines of code do the same thing
